name: Operation: Stormastray
description:
A mysterious incident has resulted in the disappearance of five individuals in one night, under the cover of a violent storm. Sweeping them astray of their lives and homes. Their current whereabouts are a mystery. One which grows colder and fainter as each passing day washes it further from the world.

You are Junior Regulator Brietn Draetn.

And you are the one who is going to solve this mystery, and bring these missing individuals home.

A fan game based on and inspired by the colorful and creative world of Vast Error and Snowbound Blood.
